title: Joint Optimization of Masks and Deep Recurrent Neural Networks for Monaural Source Separation

excerpt: Abstract: Monaural source separation is important for many real world applications. It is challenging in that, given only single channel information is available, there is an infinite number of solutions without proper constraints. In this paper, we explore joint optimization  ...

title: Adaptive Denoising Autoencoders: A Fine-tuning Scheme to Learn from Test Mixtures
authors: M Kim, P Smaragdis - Latent Variable Analysis and Signal Separation
excerpt: Abstract This work aims at a test-time fine-tune scheme to further improve the performance of an already-trained Denoising AutoEncoder (DAE) in the context of semi-supervised audio source separation. Although the state-of-the-art deep learning-based DAEs show sensible  ...
